title: The Psychedelic Witch - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/25/18
itunes:title: The Psychedelic Witch - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/25/18
description:
George Noory and practicing witch Tom Hatsis explore his research into herbs and psychedelic drugs to see how microdosing psychedelics can heal the mind and trigger powerful visions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
